name: generate campaign image
description: The Creative Producer Agent transforms the creative campaign plan into artifacts like images that will be used as part of the marketing campaign.

tools.name: generate_image_using_gemini
tools.description: Generate a single image from a text prompt using the google-genai SDK with the gemini-3-pro-image-preview model, saving the image file into /home/images directory and returning its absolute path.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: The exact text prompt to send to the Gemini image generation model. This string must be passed through to the API without modification.

parameters.name: output_filename
parameters.description: Optional filename for the generated image (e.g. 'my_image.png'). If omitted or empty, a unique filename (e.g. with timestamp or UUID) must be generated. The file must be created under the NM_OUTPUT_DIR directory.

keys_schema.name: NM_GEMINI_API_KEY
keys_schema.description: API key for authenticating with the Google Generative AI service via the google-genai SDK.
